title: VICTORIA 3 | WARS & DIPLOMATIC PLAYS EXPLAINED (Beginner's Guide & How to Play)

media:group.media:title: VICTORIA 3 | WARS & DIPLOMATIC PLAYS EXPLAINED (Beginner's Guide & How to Play)
media:group.media:description:
In this beginner's guide video for Victoria 3 we're going to take a look at how war and diplomatic plays work in the game. The tutorial should help you come to grips with which diplomatic plays do what, how naval invasions and actions can be used to your advantage, the economics of war, and the how battles and fronts actually work. This beginner's guide series will cover a variety of topics over multiple episodes, diving deep into core concepts of Victoria 3 - despite it being possible to play through a game without declaring war, how war works is definitely worth understanding and exploring.

31:08 - The Aftermath of War
